taxi.model

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • taxi.model.Customer

  • @Entity
public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Customer class implements all customers using the taxi service.

    Every customer has a list of requests done, since he can make several requests It also has:

    • name,
    • surname,
    • sex,
    • username,
    • password,
    • dateOfBirth,
    • locationLat,
    • locationLon,
    • address,
    • city,
    • zipCode,
    • email,
    • creditCardType,
    • creditCardNumber,
    • expiryDate,
    • ccv
    Since:
    Academic Year 2016-2017
    Author:
    Team 4

      • Customer

        public Customer()

        The default constructor

      • Customer

        public Customer(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String surname,
                java.lang.String sex,
                java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String password,
                java.util.Date dateOfBirth,
                double locationLat,
                double locationLon,
                java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String city,
                int zipCode,
                java.lang.String email,
                java.lang.String creditCardType,
                java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                java.lang.String expiryDate,
                java.lang.String ccv)

        The main constructor

        Parameters:
        name - name of the customer, type String
        surname - surname of the customer, type String
        sex - sex of the customer, type String
        username - username of the customer, type String
        password - password of the customer, type String
        dateOfBirth - date of birth of the customer, type Date
        locationLat - latitude of the customer, type double
        locationLon - longtitude of the customer, type double
        address - address of the customer, type String
        city - city of the customer, type String
        zipCode - zip code of the customer, type integer
        email - email of the customer, type String
        creditCardType - credit card type of customer's credit card, type String
        creditCardNumber - credit card number of customer's credit card, type String
        expiryDate - expiry date of customer's credit card, type String
        ccv - ccv of customer's credit card, type String

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)

        setPassword method
